name: CINACALCET TRIMA 30 MG
treatmentDescriptions: Treatment of secondary hyperparathyroidism (HPT) in patients with end-stage renal disease (ESRD) on maintenance dialysis therapy. Cinacalcet -Trima  may be used as part of a therapeutic regimen including phosphate binders and/or Vitamin D sterols, as appropriate. Reduction of hypercalcaemia in patients with:• parathyroid carcinoma.• primary HPT for whom parathyroidectomy would be indicated on the basis of serum calcium levels (as defined by relevant treatment guidelines), but in whom parathyroidectomy is not clinically appropriate or is contraindicated.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
